name: Master Smith
backstory: Forged weapons during the Dragon War. His creations helped turn the tide of several battles, earning him respect throughout the realm.
notes: Recently lost his prized enchanted hammer, which he suspects was stolen rather than misplaced.

conversationLog.Player: Good day, Master Smith. I heard you're having some trouble.
conversationLog.Master Smith: Aye, stranger. My finest hammer's gone missing. Three days now I've been without it, and my work's suffering. Don't suppose you'd be willing to help an old smith out?

conversationLog.Player: I could look for it. Any idea where it might be?
conversationLog.Master Smith: I had it last when working on a special order. Since then, I've noticed some strange footprints around my forge. Small ones, like a child or... something else.
